controller.interfaces

Interface IBalanceController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BalanceController

    public interface IBalanceController
    This is the interface for the BalanceController.
    Author:
    Sofia Rosetti

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addView(BalanceView v)
      This method adds a new BalanceView to this controller.
      void commandClose()
      This method performs the action relative to the pressure of the home button.
      void commandSearch(java.lang.String year)
      This method performs the action relative to the pressure of the search button.
      double computeProfit()
      This method calls the model method which calculates the total income deriving from all the uploaded exhibits, at the current date.
      void save()
      This method saves the model in the specified file.
      javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel uploadTable()
      This method uploads all the exhibits that have been opened, and the related income, putting these data into a DefaultTableModel.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        void save()
        This method saves the model in the specified file.

      • addView

        void addView(BalanceView v)
        This method adds a new BalanceView to this controller.
        Parameters:
        v - the new view

      • uploadTable

        javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel uploadTable()
        This method uploads all the exhibits that have been opened, and the related income, putting these data into a DefaultTableModel.
        Returns:
        the DefaultTableModel containing the exhibits and the incomes

      • computeProfit

        double computeProfit()
        This method calls the model method which calculates the total income deriving from all the uploaded exhibits, at the current date.
        Returns:
        the total income at the current date

      • commandSearch

        void commandSearch(java.lang.String year)
        This method performs the action relative to the pressure of the search button.
        Parameters:
        year - the year whose income has to be displayed

      • commandClose

        void commandClose()
        This method performs the action relative to the pressure of the home button.
